This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.

Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version uBlock Origin 1.43.0 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it.
<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/185085560-87b27180-6640-4d11-8da7-1b074e416495.png)

</details>

I can reproduce it only if I disable these filters (from AdGuard Base filter):
```
forum.mobilism.me#?##pagecontent > table.tablebg > tbody > tr[class^="row"]:has(> td.profile td.postdetails:contains(The Advertiser))
forum.mobilism.me#?##pagecontent > table.tablebg > tbody > tr[class^="row"]:has(> td.profile td.postdetails:contains(The Advertiser)) + tr[class^="row"]
```

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/185085632-a0cecdc8-6e82-4bed-a461-f5c5453e99bf.png)

</details>

Please try to update filters and check again.

comment.body:
I would need more information to check it out.

Could you please check if ad is hidden if you add these rules:
```
forum.mobilism.me#?##pagecontent > table.tablebg > tbody > tr[class^="row"]:has(> td.profile td.postdetails:contains(The Advertiser))
forum.mobilism.me#?##pagecontent > table.tablebg > tbody > tr[class^="row"]:has(> td.profile td.postdetails:contains(The Advertiser)) + tr[class^="row"]
```
to user rules.

If it will not work, then please add this rule to user rules:
```
forum.mobilism.me#?#body:has(div)
```
It just for tests purpose, website should be blank.

If this rule will work correctly, then please remove it, click right mouse button on ad, then inspect element and please make a screenshot with ad's code (like on a screenshot below, `The Advertiser` text should be visible).

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/185114351-b22d8edb-e2c0-4eb3-afcc-8ebc2cb6912e.png)

</details>

Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
@zloyden 

> This is a Russian website, so the rules have to be added to AdGuard Russian

I was just looking at TLD, but you are right.

> but the control panel does not appear

You are right again. At the beginning, the deactivated control appears for a short time (and I should have tested more thoroughly here), but the script makes the control available only after the ads. However, without the IMA3 API, the `adsInitialization` function will fail at some point. The script hides the controller using a class, and I didn't removed this class:
```
limehd.tv#%#//scriptlet('remove-class', 'video-sdk-container--up', '#video-sdk-container', 'stay')
```

Although your solution is more optimal, since it is only an exception.

Thanks for the tips and sorry! 🙂

1. Найти, в каком контент-блокере проблемное правило(а) и определить тип ломающих правил - обычное или из расширенной блокировка

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
> Hmmm, do I understand correctly that you are using Chrome version 105 (beta)? If so, it looks like that it's a bug and some Extended CSS rules do not work with this version (I can reproduce it with Chrome 105).
> 
> Do you have also stable Chrome version installed? If so, could you please check if you see these ads with that version?

I can confirm that Ad is removed in Chrome 105 stable even with all custom rules disabled.
There's only a missing leftover line I think...

issue.title: Google Play: com.mobilityware.solitaire
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mobilityware.solitaire](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.mobilityware.solitaire) ### Comment > Jedes Mal, wenn man im Spiel neuen Deal oder neuen Gewinner Deal oder auch tägliche Herausforderung klickt, wird zunächst ein werbescreen geöffnet. Wenn Edgard eingreift, ist dieser werbescreen komplett schwarz bis auf ein X oben rechts. Wenn Edgar nicht eingreift gibt es unterschiedliche regionale Werbung, ein Beispiel habe ich beigefügt. Manchmal blendet die App aber auch nur eine Eigenwerbung für ein anderes Spiel derselben Firma ein Punkt auch davon habe ich einen Screenshot beigefügt. Der Bildschirm wird jedes Mal komplett ausgefüllt, es gibt also keine langen Screenshots zu senden. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.
